Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Hoyne
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Western, 51st, Ashland and 47th, over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Western, 51st, Ashland and 47th, over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/19th
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 16th, Kostner, Cermak and Pulaski: due to, fire department activity near Pulaski/16th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 16th, Kostner, Cermak, Pulaski and over regular route: due to, fire department activity near Pulaski/16th.
